TopicTitle: No that's what I call planning a trajectory! (With video)

Articles.Content:
http://blogs.esa.int/rosetta/2014/04/15/replanning-europes-mission-of-the-decade-the-backstory/

How they do come up with this stuff is just impressive! (3 Earth flyby's and total of 8 of flybys)
WOW, that is pretty awesome. Serious gravity slingshots there. Imagine the math it took to plan that one out.
I'm only guessing but I doubt they did the maths by hand. I imagine they simulated trajectories with some kind of a genetic algorithm that narrows down a perfect solution.
